alert.note: Alert for Clark; Garland; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clark, southeastern Garland, south central Saline and eastern Hot Spring Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Caddo Valley, or 7 miles northeast of Arkadelphia, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Benton... Hot Springs Village... Arkadelphia... Malvern... Haskell... Rockport... Caddo Valley... Traskwood... Perla... Lonsdale... Donaldson... Friendship... Magnet Cove... Gifford... Glen Rose... De Roche... Owensville... Midway in Hot Spring County... Lower Lake Recreation Area... Nance... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 76 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
